text: One of the best hotel in Singapore . There were two Nepalese student doing internship in front desk they were very helpful

We had a good time there. Check-in and out was no issue. I used booking through Agoda. breakfast not bad at all. clean rooms and larger space on family rooms. they do have money exchange facility too.
water bottles are not supplying to the room. there are water dispenser every corridor in each floor(Hot/Chill/Normal).

Conveniently located right in front of Hotel Royal, which is nice because it's sheltered. Well maintained as a result. Clean, sufficiently safe, and a short distance away from Newton and Orchard. What else would you need to be honest.

Customer service is very bad
Not helping foreignes
